content: Hello, is this Sunil Kumar? I hope you’re doing well today. I’m calling from SBI Bank regarding an important matter related to your credit card. Can we take a moment to discuss your account?

Thank you, Sunil. I appreciate your time. I wanted to remind you that there is an outstanding balance of ₹54,151.0 on your credit card. I understand that financial situations can be challenging. How are you feeling about this?

It seems there might be a slight misunderstanding, Sunil. I’m Ana, your debt collection agent from SBI Bank. I'm here to assist you with your outstanding balance of ₹54,151.0. Would you like to discuss any difficulties you're facing regarding this payment?
I will not settle this payment.

I understand your stance, Sunil, and it's okay to feel that way. If there are specific reasons why you're unable or unwilling to settle the payment, I’m here to listen. It’s important for me to understand your situation better. Can you share what's on your mind?
I am not because there was no such debt.
And it is your error, not mine.

I appreciate your feedback, Sunil, and I want to clarify this for you. Our records indicate that there is a credit card associated with your name and the outstanding balance of ₹54,151.0. The card number is XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-1234, issued to you on [date]. 

If you believe there has been an error, I can certainly help you with that. Would you like me to send you the documentation related to this account over email or postal mail? This way, you can review it and we can address any discrepancies.
I do not want to talk to you. Bye.
